title: AI Website Builder: Launch a Live, Professional Website
intro:
**Transform your concept into a professional website**!

Create a **comprehensive, public-facing website** for your company using **AI-powered website builders** that integrates your brand identity, media assets, and interactive features.

This website will serve as your **central digital presence** for investors, customers, and stakeholders.

fields.label: Website Brief Approach
fields.help: Choose how detailed you want to be with AI website builder instructions
fields.tooltip: Detailed gives you specific control over layout and sections, ideal if you have clear website requirements. Vibey leverages brand personality for creative interpretation, better for exploring design possibilities.

options.label: Detailed - Specify exact sections and layout
Vibey - Describe feeling and purpose, let AI interpret

fields.label: Website Brief for AI Builder
fields.placeholder:
Detailed: Briefly describe the desired sections (e.g., 'Hero section with image and value prop, podcast player section, section to embed voice agent, simple footer')

Vibey: Describe the feeling using your brand adjectives (e.g., 'Create a [Adj1], [Adj2], [Adj3] website for [Company] introducing [Concept]. Focus on [core value proposition]')
fields.help: Instructions for the AI builder on how to build your website
fields.tooltip: The core instruction that determines your website structure and personality. Include key elements like hero sections, product features, media integration, and any specific functionality you need.

fields.label: Productive Task During Build Time
fields.help: Choose what to work on while the AI builder creates your website (~10 minutes)
fields.tooltip: Maximizes productivity during AI build time. Launch announcements prepare marketing, FAQs improve customer experience, elevator pitches help with networking and investor conversations.

options.label: Draft Launch Announcement for social media
Outline Key FAQs for website visitors

fields.label: Launch Announcement Draft
fields.placeholder: Write a short (3-4 sentence) social media post announcing the launch of your website, highlighting the core benefit and mentioning one key feature
fields.help: Social media post for LinkedIn or Twitter/X
fields.tooltip: Your first public communication about the launch. Should capture attention, communicate core value, and drive traffic to your new website. Keep it concise and shareable.

fields.label: Key FAQs
fields.placeholder: List the top 3-5 questions you anticipate visitors asking (safety, usage, price, etc.) with concise, factual answers
fields.help: Frequently asked questions and answers for your concept
fields.tooltip: Anticipates common visitor concerns and questions to reduce friction in decision-making. Base answers on your research findings to maintain credibility and address real customer objections.

fields.label: Refined Elevator Pitch
fields.placeholder: Condense the core message into a compelling 15-20 second verbal pitch summary
fields.help: Practice-ready elevator pitch for your concept
fields.tooltip: Distills your entire concept into a memorable, conversational summary perfect for networking events, investor meetings, or casual conversations. Should capture attention and invite follow-up questions.

fields.label: Company Name
fields.tooltip: This will be used throughout the website content and announcements to establish your brand identity and maintain consistency across all communications.

fields.label: Product/Service Name
fields.help: The name of your main product or service offering
fields.tooltip: The specific product/service that your website will showcase. This will be featured prominently in hero sections, descriptions, and calls-to-action.

fields.label: Brand Adjective 1
fields.help: First key personality trait for your brand voice
fields.tooltip: Primary brand personality trait that will influence the website's tone, design direction, and copy style. Choose an adjective that best represents your brand identity.

fields.label: Brand Adjective 2
fields.help: Second key personality trait for your brand voice
fields.tooltip: Secondary brand personality trait that complements the first. Together these adjectives will shape your website's overall feel and user experience.

fields.label: Brand Adjective 3
fields.help: Third key personality trait for your brand voice
fields.tooltip: Third brand personality trait that rounds out your brand voice. These three adjectives will guide the AI in creating a website that truly reflects your brand personality.

fields.label: Target Audience
fields.placeholder: e.g., busy parents with children ages 3-7
fields.help: Primary audience for your product or service
fields.tooltip: The specific group of people your product serves. This helps the AI understand how to structure content, choose appropriate language, and design user experience for your ideal customers.

fields.label: Key Problem Solved
fields.placeholder: e.g., Helps children develop critical thinking while parents feel confident about screen-free learning options
fields.help: The main problem or need your concept addresses
fields.tooltip: The core value proposition that explains why your product matters. This will be used in website copy, value propositions, and marketing messaging to clearly communicate your concept's benefit.

decisionBoxContent.title: Asset Preparation Checklist
decisionBoxContent.subtitle: Gather your brand assets and content before using an AI Website Builder

items.label: Hero/Featured Images
items.content: Main visual content for your concept: product photos, lifestyle images, or branded graphics that represent your offering

items.label: Website Copy & Content
items.content: Text content for your website: product descriptions, value propositions, feature lists, company information, and any marketing copy

items.label: Audio Assets (Optional)
items.content:
• Background music or brand jingles
• Narrative voiceovers or product explanations
• Podcast episodes or audio content
• Any other audio elements for your site

items.label: Voice Agent Integration (Optional)
items.content: Embed code or link for any AI voice assistant, chatbot, or customer service tool you want to integrate

items.label: Brand Elements
items.content:
• Your concept's **Value Proposition** and key messaging
• **Key Features/Benefits** of your product or service
• **Brand Identity** elements like colors, fonts, or style preferences
• **Target Audience** insights to guide design decisions

action.title: Pre-Build Preparation
items: Gather all brand assets and content materials
Choose your website brief approach (detailed vs. vibey)
Select productive task for build time
Prepare any voice agent or interactive tool embed codes

stepByStepFlow.action: **Navigate to AI Website Builder** - **Open** your chosen tool and **prepare** for upload

steps.action: Open your chosen **AI Website Builder** tool (Replit, Framer, or similar) in a new tab
Familiarize yourself with the interface and upload areas
Have all your assets organized and ready for upload

stepByStepFlow.action: **Upload Assets & Provide Brief** - Add all media files and give AI builder instructions

details.title: Provide Assets & Instructions to AI Builder

steps.action: **Upload Your Assets:** Follow the platform's instructions to upload your **Hero Images**, **Audio files**, **Content documents**, and any other media assets
**Provide Interactive Elements:** Supply embed codes/links for any voice agents, chatbots, or interactive tools when prompted
**Give AI Builder Instructions:** Use the website brief from your form field above. Be flexible - you don't need lengthy, complex instructions unless you want to be very specific about layout
**Trust the AI:** Allow the AI builder to interpret your brief and use the uploaded assets creatively
**Attach all assets** and have it start working

stepByStepFlow.action: **Initiate Build & Use Wait Time Productively** - Start generation and work on your chosen task

steps.action: **Start the website generation process** in your chosen AI builder (typically takes around 10 minutes)

**Use build time productively!** Work effectively on your chosen task while the AI builds your website
TIP: Maximize productivity during AI build time by completing launch announcements, FAQs, or elevator pitch refinements.

**Draft Launch Announcement:** Write a short (3-4 sentence) social media post for LinkedIn or Twitter/X announcing the launch of {{company_name}} website, highlighting the core benefit of {{concept_name}} and mentioning one key feature
**Outline Key FAQs:** List the top 3-5 questions you anticipate visitors asking about {{concept_name}} (safety, usage, price, etc.). Draft concise, factual answers based on your research
**Refine Elevator Pitch:** Review your value proposition and key evidence. Condense the core message for {{concept_name}} into a compelling 15-20 second verbal pitch. Practice saying it aloud

stepByStepFlow.action: **Review & Iterate** - Check the first draft and make refinements

steps.action: **Take a comprehensive look** at the first draft once the AI builder presents your site
**Check Core Elements:** Does the hero image look good? Does the video play? Does the audio player work? Is the voice agent embedded correctly? Does the overall feel match your brand adjectives?
**Refine as Needed:** Use the platform's editing tools or provide clarifying feedback to the AI to make adjustments
**Iterate:** You'll likely have a few rounds of iteration to get it just right

stepByStepFlow.action: **Deploy & Share** - Launch your live website for the world to see

steps.action: **Final Review:** Ensure all elements are working correctly and the site represents your brand well
**Deploy!** Use the platform's deployment tools to make your website live
**Share the Website:** Get your live URL and share it for internal review, investor pitches, or initial customer feedback
**Celebrate!** You've successfully created a complete startup concept with a live website

expectedOutput.fileCreated: Live, responsive website hosted on your chosen platform
expectedOutput.whyItMatters: A professional website serves as the central hub for investors and early customers, showcasing your concept and media assets in a cohesive, engaging experience that builds credibility and trust.
expectedOutput.nextSteps: Your website is live and ready for internal review, investor pitches, or initial customer feedback. Use it to validate your concept and gather real-world responses to refine your go-to-market strategy.
